aboutDescription: LayerCSS is a CSS-based design language that introduces advanced features to facilitate the creation of modular, reusable, and maintainable styles.
footerText: Â© 2025 LayerCSS. All rights reserved. Apache 2.0 License.
featureGlobalVariables: Global and Local Variables: Define reusable values across the project or within specific blocks.
featureNestedBlocks: Nested Blocks: Write styles hierarchically to improve readability and reduce selector repetition.
featureLayers: Layers (@layer): Organize styles into logical sections like base, components, or utilities.
featureComments: Structured Comments: Supports single-line (//) and multi-line (/* ... */) comments.
featureAnimations: Support for Animations and Keyframes: Create dynamic visual effects easily.
philosophyModularity: Modularity: Divide your styles into logical sections.
philosophyReusability: Reusability: Define values once and use them in multiple places.
philosophyMaintainability: Ease of maintenance: Change a value in one place and affect the entire project.
